name: AstroCore
description:
Astrocore is a minimalist arcade-style action game combining elements of Breakout, Asteroids, and cellular automata sims like Conway's Game of Life. The goal of the game is to defeat the "asteroids" by reflecting their shots back at them and breaking their cores.

Collect health and fuel drops by breaking asteroid cells to survive. Collect as many cores as you can!

Keyboard:

W, A, S, D: Spin, forward and backward thrust
Q, E: Strafe left and right
Shift: Hold to boost (consumes additional fuel)
Space: Warp forward (consumes some health)
P: Pause

Controller:

Left Stick: Strafe left and right, forward and backward thrust
Right Stick: Spin
L1 / Left Trigger: Hold to boost  (consumes additional fuel)
R1 / Right Trigger: Warp forward (consumes some health)
L2: Backwards thrust
R2: Forward thrust
Start/Options: Pause

Made with Godot 3.2.2

This is an initial prototype for the Small & Infinite game jam 2020. We'll be adding a settings menu, improvements, and additional enemy variety in a future update. Stay tuned!
